name: Star Wars: X-Wing - B-Wing Tour of Duty
name_original: Star Wars: X-Wing - B-Wing Tour of Duty
description:
Star Wars: X-Wing - B-Wing Tour of Duty is a simulation game developed by LucasArts Entertainment. It came out on 01-01-1993. LucasArts Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Star Wars: X-Wing - B-Wing Tour of Duty is available on PC.
